short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Literally just one CSS rule to get rid of the new stupid gradient on YouTube's progress bar. That's it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever looked at YouTube's new weird pink progress bar gradient and thought, "thanks, I hate it?"

Yeah, me too. 

This extension is literally just a single CSS rule to make the progress bar red. That's it. No funky permissions, no signup, no accessing your personal info or user data. Just a red progress bar.
